text: Fase 1 completa: Sistema unificado de conhecimento implementado com KnowledgeTracker

Commit 3a73df9: feat(knowledge): implement unified knowledge system with Graphiti integration

- Add KnowledgeTracker service (lib/knowledge/)
  - types.ts: TypeScript interfaces for episodes, search, metadata
  - tracker.ts: Main tracker class with Graphiti + fallback support
  - index.ts: Re-exports

- Add API routes (/api/knowledge/)
  - search: Semantic search in knowledge graph
  - track: Record knowledge episodes
  - health: Check Graphiti and fallback status

- Add automation scripts (scripts/knowledge/)
  - index-session.ts: Index development sessions
  - track-commit.ts: Auto-track git commits

- Add git hook (scripts/hooks/post-commit)
  - Automatically tracks commits in knowledge graph

- Create CONHECIMENTO agent (.agent/workflows/)
  - Manages knowledge graph operations
  - Documents usage patterns

- Update all 14 agents with knowledge integration
  - Add 'ðŸ§  IntegraÃ§Ã£o com Conhecimento' section
  - Add @collaborates: CONHECIMENTO
  - Update @last-verified to 2025-12-30

- Update _DNA.md with knowledge section
  - Base principles inherited by all agents

- Update manutencao.md
  - Add Phase 5: Graphiti sync
  - Add knowledge metrics to health checks

- Update _INDEX.md with CONHECIMENTO agent
